text.author: Eric Forcier
text.title: Re(a)d Wedding: A Comparative Discourse Analysis of Fan Responses to Game of Thrones
text.summary: This paper studies the responses of viewers of the series Game of Thrones to its pivotal third season episode, “The Rains of Castamere”, comparing online threads by viewers familiar with the plot from the books on which the series is based with those of new fans who had not read the books.
